name: Traveling Changing Pad PDF sewing pattern
description:
There are tons of baby accessories out there but this one is not only adorable but is sure to be used by a new mom again and again!  Combining the changing pad with pockets to hold both a diaper and your wipes makes this pattern really nice for staying organized.  

The traveling changing pad features a 24" changing pad and two pockets.  One pocket holds diapers and the other, lined in PUL, holds wipes.  PUL is a plastic coated material to keep your wipes moist and fresh for diaper changes.  Folded and tied, the piece measures 6" x 8".  

Materials needed to make the traveling changing pad are cotton fabric, terry cloth (or substitute), PUL (or substitute), velcro, sewing machine & other sewing basics.  This is a beginners project that can also be customized for a more advanced sewer.

A link to download the PDF pattern will be sent to your paypal email directly after your purchase is complete.  Start sewing now and create something beautiful!

You do have permission to sell changing pads you make from this pattern on a small, handmade scale.  You are required to give Gingercake credit for the pattern.  Thanks!

name: Modern Folksy Bunny PDF Sewing Pattern
description:
This is a PDF sewing pattern.  You will receive an email with a link to download the pattern immediately after your purchase is complete.  Download to your computer immediately since the system only gives you 3 changes to view the PDF pattern and then you will have to contact me for another copy.

The Modern Folksy Bunny is a fun and simple sewing pattern that you will be able to sew up in only a few hours or less.  The pillow shape makes him perfect to cuddle with during nap time or a lovely decoration in a nursery or in the easter basket.  The simple construction of the bunny makes it an excellent project for beginners but also fun for more experienced sewers.  

The finished bunny measures 11" x 11" not including 7 extra inches with the ears!   You will need regular cotton fabric, polyfil, buttons for eyes, yarn for the pom pom tail, cotton woven fusible interfacing, and a sewing machine!  The instructions are 12 pages long including full pattern pieces and plenty of colorful pictures.  You should be able to properly run your sewing machine, know very basic sewing terms and be able to do a little bit of hand sewing.  

This sweet bunny is modern in its simple shape but also reminds us of a folksy, handmade past.  I know you will enjoy creating this simple and beautiful bunny!

name: 3 Layer Clutch PDF Sewing Pattern
description:
This is a PDF Sewing Pattern.  Once your purchase is complete, you will immediately receive an email with a link to download the pattern.  Download onto your computer and get sewing right away!

I originally created this wallet for myself since I wanted to have a piece that I could keep in my bag or just bring the wallet alone.  I loved the idea of layers to make this wallet multifunctional- wallet, zippered pouch and notebook.  I have been using this wallet for months now and I love it!  It has all that I need and I love the versatility of carrying it in my purse or just using it as a clutch. 

This sewing pattern is full of pictures and simple descriptions.  I would not recommend printing it out since the pictures would use up lots of your ink!   Instead, you can easily follow using your tablet or computer in your sewing room.   Printing out the final page as a reference guide would be helpful though.  For those sewers who are more visual, most of the steps are not only written but are clearly explained in pictures.  

This is a simple project but it does require some skills that are beyond the very beginning stage of sewing.  It is not suitable for a first project!  You need to have mastered a few basic skills and and be able to understand basic sewing language.  These skills include gathering, using a zipper foot (although you could hand sew the zipper with the same result), understanding terms like seam allowance, right sides of fabric, and being able to sew a confident straight line.  Easy!  

The magic of creating 3 layers is so fun and will teach you lots of new simple sewing skills.  The first layer is a traditional wallet that features 6 credit card/ business card pockets and a 2 large pockets that are the perfect size for a check book and cash.  The lined zippered pouch is a great size to hold loose change, pens, your phone, lipstick, a mirror or whatever you choose!  The 3rd layer is a covered notebook in the standard 5 x 7" size.  Perfect for making your lists, writing quick notes or jotting down ideas.  This section also features 2 more pockets that can be used for coupons, receipts or business cards.  The clutch is finished off with a fold over flap and magnetic snap.  The final size of the folded clutch is about 8" by 6.5".

Material requirements include a combined 1/2 yard of coordinating cotton fabrics, fusible interfacing, duck cloth (recommended for its weight but not required), cotton batting, sewing machine with zig zag foot and zipper foot (again, you can get around this by hand sewing) and other basic sewing tools.  

Are you ready to get sewing?  The possibilities of customizing this clutch to suit your needs are endless!   The result is a chic and super organized clutch!

name: Annie's Penguin Pillow PDF Sewing Pattern
description:
My daughter Anne loves penguins- wait, don't ALL kids love penguins?  This one is such a cutie.  Made with super soft and cuddly flannel, Annie's Penguin is just begging for a big hug.  

This is a PDF sewing pattern.  Immediately after purchase, you will receive a link to download the sewing pattern to your computer.  Instant gratification and you can begin sewing right away!  

The penguin measures about 14" tall and 8" wide.  Materials needed are flannel fabric, felt, thread, a sewing machine & stuffing.  This project is beginner friendly with 8 pages of detailed instructions (including color pictures) and 2 pages of full size pattern pieces.   Plan a few hours to complete the project your first time making one.

You do have permission to sell your version of Annie's penguin if credit is given to gingercake for the sewing pattern.  More details are included in the pattern document.

Annie's penguin will make a sweet companion to any special child in your life.  Customizing this pillow is simple and fun.  Enjoy!

name: Hobo Style Lunch Sak
description:
THe Hobo Lunch Sak is fun, stylish, and designed to make bringing your lunch to school or work extra special!  Say good bye to paper and plastic sacks and say hello to a cute and functional lunch bag.

This is a PDF pattern that you will receive a direct link to download as soon as your purchase is complete.  The Hobo Style Lunch Sak is a 10 page long document and is full of bright pictures and simple instructions.  Printable pattern pieces are also included.

The lunch bag is made of cotton fabrics with optional instructions for a laminated cotton interior and insulbrite batting to keep your lunch cooler (or hotter!) longer.  The finished piece measures 13" high, 10" wide, and 4" deep at the base.  Lots of room!  

Can you imagine how cute this bag would look on your desk at work?  Or how cute it would look in your child's backpack at school?  The tie can be opened for a big salad container but most items will just slide in.   It is made to be machine washable and then quickly ironed to look like new again.

You may sell lunch bags made from this pattern with permission by emailing me AFTER purchase.  Credit will need to be given to Gingercake Pattern and Design.

name: Lucky the Elephant PDF Sewing Pattern
description:
You will love making this cute and easy elephant pillow for all the little sweeties in your life. Lucky is a 12 page PDF pattern that comes to your email right away after your purchase!  The pattern includes lots of pictures and detailed instructions. A good project for beginners but also a fast and gratifying project for a more advanced sewer.

The elephant measures 10" tall and 15" wide. Materials needed are about a 1/2 yard of mixed cotton fabrics, fusible interfacing, polyfil, and a sewing machine. 

An elephant with his trunk up represents good luck. What a sweet, bright and fun addition to any child's room! I made mine with a button eye so if you are going to let him be in a baby's room, you need to keep him out of reach or change the eye to felt.

name: Max the Owl PDF Pattern
description:
This listing is for purchase of the PDF pattern to make Max the Owl Pillow. I designed this owl to be simple, fun and stylish. The directions are straight forward and easy to follow. Max measures about 10" X 10". You will love the endless color combination possibilities!

This pattern is in PDF format. You will receive 2 pages of detailed instructions and 2 pages of to scale pattern pieces. THIS EMAILS TO YOU IMMEDIATELY AFTER YOU COMPLETE YOUR ORDER! Start sewing right away! Feel free to email me any questions you have about the pattern before you purchase or during the project.

By purchasing this pattern, you are able to sell your Max the owl pillows creations on a small handmade scale.  Please give gingercake patterns credit for the pattern!

Join the Max and Lola Flickr group to display your creation and get ideas! http://www.flickr.com/groups/1198359@N25/

name: Lola The Owl Pillow PDF Pattern and bonus Lola Owl Bag Pattern
description:
This listing is for the PDF pattern to make Lola the Owl Pillow AND Lola the Owl Bag. You will receive a link to your email that will allow you to download the pattern.   Save the pattern to your computer and start sewing right away! 

Lola is a simple and fun project. She is quick and easy and beginners to advanced sewers are sure to love the final product. You will be making these for the all the owl lovers in your life before you know it!

Lola measures 11" x 10". She has wings and a classic owl face in the front and a nice big pocket in the back. The materials used in this project are cotton fabric, wool felt, flannel for lining, polyfil, and thread. 

These instructions are full of bright and well explained photos.  It is seventeen pages long and includes 3 pages of full size pattern pieces.

Lola is the perfect unique baby gift, special present for an owl loving child, or as a unique throw pillow for an adult or teenager too!  The bag version is perfect for carrying a few library books, nature finds, or a wallet and notepad.

You may sell finished Lola owls and owl bags at your local craft shows on a small handmade scale.  You are not permitted to sell finished Lola's online in any way. 

The possibilities for creativity are endless with this project. Get sewing today!

name: Katie Bird Pillow PDF Sewing Pattern
description:
This listing is for a PDF pattern that comes to your email.  You will receive the email as soon as you complete your order. Start sewing right away! 

This super sweet bird pillow is not only simple but really fun to make. Watching it all come together is so cute! Perfect for a baby in soft sweet fabrics. Perfect for a big kid room make over in brighter colors and textures. Cute even in a teen room or dorm room in trendy designer fabrics.

Katie Bird measures 15.5" long (from tip of beak to tip of tail) and 6.5" tall. She is about 4.5" thick all stuffed. Nice size for an accent pillow. This pattern requires beginner sewing skills and will help you learn some new techniques. 

You will need a sewing machine, and a little bit of hand sewing. Polyfil, fusible interfacing, bits of wool felt, and a combination of cotton fabrics.

I will allow some selling of creations made from this pattern but not on Etsy or other internet sites. Please convo me for further discussion.

Thanks so much for looking!

name: Love Your Lunch Box PDF Sewing Pattern and Bonus snack Bag Pattern
description:
This is a PDF pattern that will come directly to your email.
You will receive a link to download the pattern in your email as soon as you complete your order. Start sewing right away! 

This is a darling little lunch box designed for elementary school students. It features a boxy shape, side pockets, & a velcro flap. The finished bag is about 8" x 8" x 2.75".  You can use endless fabric combos to make this very functional lunch box cute and fun. The instructions are clear and simple with lots of pictures to help guide you. 

The pattern is newly updated with 18 pages of instruction including full pattern pieces, bright pictures and a bonus pattern to make your own snack bags.  

You will need about about 1/2 yard of fabric, interfacing, insulbrite batting, velcro & a sewing machine! 

You are able to sell lunch boxes made from this pattern on a small, handmade scale.  More information about this is given in the pattern document.  

Please feel free to contact me with questions!

name: Crayon Art Folio PDF Sewing Pattern
description:
This is a pattern, written and designed by me, that you are sure to love! It is simple and straightforward. You will need to be able to understand very basic sewing directions.  It is full of bright bright pictures, easy to follow instructions, and pattern pieces for easy assembly.  

The Crayon Art Folio is a wonderful way to get your favorite young artist organized and excited about coloring and artwork. My kids use them at home and in the car. This is the perfect gift for a long car ride- add themed stickers to the beach or the mountains and you are set to go!  

It fits 12 crayons and a 5" x 8" pad of white paper. There is also a third pocket for stickers, scissors, or other artsy accessories!

The crayon folio is 8 3/4" wide by 6 1/2" tall when closed. It features a velcro closure for easy opening and closing and grosgrain ribbon (or fabric) handles for carrying around and looking cute.

NEW!  Now the crayon art folio pattern also includes the Mini Art Folio instructions!  This mini folio is half the size of the regular folio- perfect for keeping in your purse or as party favors.  It also is quick and easy.

THIS IS A PATTERN! You will receive a link to download the pattern immediately after your purchase and payment.  The link will let you download the 16 page PDF pattern to your computer. Start sewing right away! 

Please feel free to email me with any questions.

We now have a crayon art folio Flickr group! Come and look and display your creation too! Here's the link http://www.flickr.com/groups/1272691@N22/

name: Art Caddy Tote PDF Sewing Pattern
description:
Does your childs art area look like a big mess? Not very inspiring for a young artist! I got so tired of picking all those papers and trying to find the scissors for the 100th time that I designed this cute tote to help them get organized. 

This is a pattern. I will send you a PDF document through your email and you will print it out and make it your self. You will receive the email as soon as you complete your order. Start sewing right away! 

The art caddy measures 8.5" x 5.5" x 10". It is constructed of several layers of interfacing and batting. It is sturdy and yet flexible to fit all sorts of items. It has a crayon pocket that fits up to 18 crayons. There are 7 additional pockets to organize all you odds and ends. The inside is spacious and sturdy to hold a few folders or a bunch of coloring books.

Another nice feature of this pattern is that you can make one for your kids and then make one for yourself and your crafts! It also makes a beautiful gift for your favorite artist- just fill it up with art essentials and you are ready to go!

All of my patterns are designed for beginning to advanced sewers. You can make this as simple or complicated as you like. 

We now have a flickr group to feature creations made from the art caddy and the crayon art folio. The link is http://www.flickr.com/groups/1272691@N22/. Take a look and then post a picture of your own creation!

name: Notebook Slipcover PDF Sewing Pattern
description:
This pattern was created to revive and rejuvenate those old binder and notebooks you have sitting around the house (or new ones from the store!). It is also great for personalized, beautiful, & useful handmade gifts. Store bought journals beware! This pattern makes regular notebooks so lovely you will be covering every spare notebook in the house. 

This is a PDF pattern that you will then create yourself. You will receive the email as soon as you complete your order. Start sewing right away! 

The notebook slipcover is designed for you to be able to cover a binder or notebook of any size. It creates a thick and substantial cover that is also completely washable. This design gives a snug and professional fit to look beautifully handmade. 

To make this project you will need:
about a 3/4 yard of mix cotton fabrics
fusible interfacing
cotton batting (or something similar)
Rotary cutter & self healing mat (or scissors)
sew on velcro
Iron & ironing board
heavy duty or denim needle
sewing machine!

This will be prefect for holiday gift giving! You may sell items made from this pattern on a small scale at craft shows and online if credit it given to Gingercake Patterns.

name: On The Go Organizer PDF Sewing Pattern
description:
You will love creating this simple and pretty little organizer. Perfect for in your purse with a paper pad, business cards, & coupons or on your desk with stationary and important notes.  The On the Go Organizer is fun to make and great for using up scraps and making interesting fabric combinations.

This pattern is well suited for beginners to advanced sewers. You can easily make many at once to give away as gifts or just do one to get yourself organized. The finished piece is 8.5" X 12". It folds like a book with an elastic cord and a button as your closure. It is designed to fit an 8" x 5" paper pad and a typical size pen. It has 5 pockets total- lots of space for all your little items!

This is a PDF pattern! There are 16 pages of instructions that include lots of bright pictures and printable pattern pieces. As soon as you complete your purchase, you will receive an email with a link for you to download your pattern to your computer immediately.   Start sewing right away! 

New!  As a bonus, included in this pattern are instructions to make a colored pencil carrier and another style front of the On the Go Organizer.  So easy and fun- all from the same pattern!

You may sell items made from this pattern on a small handmade scale.  Further details about this are included in the pattern instructions

name: The Waste Free Lunch Bag PDF Sewing Pattern
description:
This is a pattern designed to make your lunch experience more stylish and to help reduce waste. No more trash to throw away after your lunch. Have you noticed how it really adds up? This is how you can start to make a difference!

I designed this bag for my 9 year old niece who is recycling maniac! She already had a bag she brought to school but wanted one that hold her water bottle, sandwich and snack without everything getting all smooshed together. This bag does it all! It is meant to hold a sandwich, a snack bag, a small water bottle or drink, an apple, & a small yogurt. Obviously you can change all of this to fit your own lunch diet or your child's.

This is a pattern which you will receive electronically by email in PDF format. It is instructions for how to make your own lunch bag. You will receive the email as soon as you complete your order. Start sewing right away! 

The finished bag measures 9.5" tall by 9" wide when full of lunch. It has a large interior pocket that fits a standard size snack bag. There is a divider in the middle to keep thing organized . A  velcro flap closure keeps everything closed.   Materials needed are cotton fabrics, insulbrite batting (for insulation to keep that lunch cold or hot!), fusible interfacing, velcro & thread.

The color and fabric combination choices are endless! You could also just use this bag as a purse and use the knowledge you gain from making this to make larger and smaller bags, add extra pockets, and custom fit it to your needs. 

It is so important for kids (and adults!) to learn the benefits of creating less waste. What could be better than a fun sewing project that also helps them learn about doing their part for the planet?

name: Make Your Getaway Duffle Children and Adult Sizes!
description:
This is a listing for you to purchase a PDF pattern/ ebook that will be sent directly to your email. You will receive the email as soon as you complete your order. Start sewing right away! 

I have a piece of stiff red luggage that has wheels that i take on the airplane for trips. I pack it up when i am going to check my bag and I know it will get the job done. But Ugh! It is ugly and not fun. Now that so many of us just do carry on and drive where we want to go, that ugly old luggage can be put high up in the attic.

This cute piece of luggage is so versatile and easy, you will be making matching duffles for everyone is your family! (maybe something in solid for your husband??). The directions are full of pictures and simple explanations. It is a great size for a 5 -7 day trip the beach or to visit family. The size can also be easily be adjusted to fit your needs. Optional interior pocket instructions are included.

I have also included pattern pieces for child's size duffle. This size can also be used for you for a weekend and as compliment to your larger duffle. You can also adjust this bag yourself to create all different sizes!  The bags are great sizes, the larger is 19 1/2" wide x 14 1/2" tall x 7 1/2" deep and the smaller is 18" wide x 12 1/2" tall x 5" deep

The bag can be made with bright stylish cottons, canvas, upholstery fabric, or even a wool. You can choose to include the lining or not. Pockets are very easy to add if you choose.
The base is a quilted piece for extra strength. The closing is a zipper which you can hand sew or use your machine.

You may sell bags made from this pattern on a small handmade scale. I would greatly appreciate credit for the pattern.
